$values.text: An "Embedded Section" allows you to embed a Section for another Fixture inside the parent Section like so
"Preferences" is an entirely different Fixture that contains all the grammars you would use to alter the current user's preferences
The panel box below is a "Section" within the specification that uses a "Fixture" titled "Glossary"
The single line below is a Sentence "Grammar"
You can also group a number of grammars together in a pre-canned macro called a "Paragraph" grammar like this one below:
A "Set Verification" is a special kind of Table used to exactly verify a set of expectations

$values.title: Address Setup
then the new address properties should be

$values.sampleMarkdown:
# Sample Specification for Address

-> id = 35126e76-7dce-4560-9981-9a6f42075653
-> lifecycle = Acceptance
-> max-retries = 0
-> last-updated = 2017-02-03T14:29:30.8536080-06:00
-> tags = 

[Address]
|> AddressByStreet line1=line1, line2=line2, City=City, StateOrProvince=StateOrProvince
|> AddressWithObjectIs Address1=Address1, Address2=Address2
|> AddressWithStreetAddress street=street, City=City, StateOrProvince=StateOrProvince
|> IfTheAddressIs Address1=Address1, Address2=Address2, City=City, StateOrProvince=StateOrProvince, Country=Country, PostalCode=PostalCode
|> IfTheAddressIs2 Address1=Address1, Address2=Address2, City=Austin
|> IfTheAddressIs3 Address1=Address1, Address2=Address2, City=City, StateOrProvince=StateOrProvince, Country=Country, PostalCode=PostalCode
|> TheAddressesAre
    [rows]
    |Address1|Address2|City  |
    |Address1|Address2|Austin|
    |Address1|Address2|Austin|
    |Address1|Address2|Austin|

|> TheAddressShouldBe Address1=Address1, Address2=Address2, City=City
|> TODO message=message
~~~

# Sample Specification for Calculator

-> id = 5f53b886-6ed0-4965-a497-ff2e2dfffa47
-> lifecycle = Acceptance
-> max-retries = 0
-> last-updated = 2017-02-03T14:29:30.8588010-06:00
-> tags = 

[Calculator]
|> Add value=value
|> AddingNumbersTogether x=x, y=y, returnValue=NULL
|> AddingNumbersTogetherAsTable
    [rows]
    |x|y|sum|
    |x|y|sum|
    |x|y|sum|
    |x|y|sum|

|> DivideBy value=value
|> MultiplyBy value=value
|> Operations
    [rows]
    |X|Y|Sum|Product|
    |X|Y|Sum|Product|
    |X|Y|Sum|Product|
    |X|Y|Sum|Product|

|> StartWith value=value
|> Subtract value=value
|> SumAndProduct X=X, Y=Y, Sum=Sum, Product=Product
|> TheValueShouldBe value=NULL
|> TODO message=message
~~~
